channel.title: NTscape My Server Project. {Under Development!}
channel.description:
[center]
PLEASE SUPPORT MY SERVER DEVELOPMENT HERE: [url=http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=NTscape]http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=NTscape[/url]
[b]Credits: 70% Zach93 (z508 source) 25% Me 5% Tristan [/b][/center]
[center][b].:Features/Updates:.[/b] PvP Drops New Home PvP armours All stats restored to Runescapes New Custom Client Theiving(95%)Need to add level at which you can were cape. Fletching(95%)Need to add level at which you can were cape. New Home Login at the correct height and location New Commands ::givemod (Player Name) ::giveadmin (Player Name) ::hiddin (Player Name) ::demote (Player Name ::giveexp (Player Name) - Gives an extra 10mil xp to spend to a certin player Godwars Redone with correct npc combat and Hp Fixed Economy Fixed over 30 Glitches Anti-syi Added Anti-Flooder Added Fixed Npc Protacals
.:Updates:. --october 14 2009-- ::Added New Command:: ::giveitem (player Name) (itemID) (Ammount) Had to change some methods for this to work.
[center][b].:Client Updates:.[/b] Added New Custom Sprites Thanks to my Co-Owner 525 Interface in a 508 client Runescape New Whip Model added
.:Major Client Update:. Added Music Player To Client 3 more methods and 1 flag to fix till working properly
.:Monday October 19:. Added new 525 cache with correct specials and mismic barrage with TB Changed to 525 loading protacal [/center]
[b].:Photos:.[/b] Custom Client [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/Client.jpg[/img] Home [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/NewHome.jpg[/img] PvP [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/Pking.jpg[/img] Prayer Recharging [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/Prayer.jpg[/img] Theiving [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/Theiving.jpg[/img] Fletching [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/Fletching.jpg[/img] PvP Armours [IMG]http://i387.photobucket.com/albums/oo313/enick20/PvParmours.jpg[/img] [/center]
Comment and Tell what you think Rep only if you wish too
>>Downloads<< Server-Coming Soon Client-Coming Soon

item.title: NTscape My Server Project. {Under Development!}
item.dc:creator: @enick20 enick20
item.description:
@enick20 wrote:

NT stands for the name of the server owners Nick and Tristan[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 11:12:49 pm[/size][hr]Moved Home to west varrock players voted and that was the top choice this is were the server will be based when i relase the open source[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 11:29:19 pm[/size][hr]PLease support if you want to at:http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=NTscape

Read full topic

item.title: NTscape My Server Project. {Under Development!}
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:7, topic:309350”][s]you know… JVM actually does stand for Java Virtual Machine… the main JRE component that runs all Java programs…
it was around before your java programming company was (common sense), so you’re stealing it’s name.
…and it’s copyrighted…

facepalm[/s][/quote]
you know… NT actually does stand for New Technology kernel… the main core component that runs the Windows operating system (from WinNT to present)…
it was around before your server project was (common sense), so you’re stealing it’s name
…and it’s copyrighted…

facepalm

Read full topic

item.title: NTscape My Server Project. {Under Development!}
item.dc:creator: @enick20 enick20
item.description:
@enick20 wrote:

[center]

PLEASE SUPPORT MY SERVER DEVELOPMENT HERE:
http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=NTscape

Credits:
70% Zach93 (z508 source)
25% Me
5% Tristan
[/center]

[center].:Features/Updates:.
PvP Drops
New Home
PvP armours
All stats restored to Runescapes
New Custom Client
Theiving(95%)Need to add level at which you can were cape.
Fletching(95%)Need to add level at which you can were cape.
New Home
Login at the correct height and location
New Commands
::givemod (Player Name)
::giveadmin (Player Name)
::hiddin (Player Name)
::demote (Player Name
::giveexp (Player Name) - Gives an extra 10mil xp to spend to a certin player
Godwars Redone with correct npc combat and Hp
Fixed Economy
Fixed over 30 Glitches
Anti-syi Added
Anti-Flooder Added
Fixed Npc Protacals

.:Updates:.
–october 14 2009–
::Added New Command::
::giveitem (player Name) (itemID) (Ammount)
Had to change some methods for this to work.

[center].:Client Updates:.
Added New Custom Sprites Thanks to my Co-Owner
525 Interface in a 508 client
Runescape New Whip Model added

.:Major Client Update:.
Added Music Player To Client
3 more methods and 1 flag to fix till working properly

.:Monday October 19:.
Added new 525 cache with correct specials and mismic barrage with TB
Changed to 525 loading protacal
[/center]

.:Photos:.
Custom Client

[/center]
